articles.title: 한국항공보안학회-한국민간경비학회, 학술연구 및 실무 협력 강화위한 MOU 체결
articles.description: 항공보안과 민간경비의 미래 인재 양성위한 상호협력 추진[보안뉴스 엄호식 기자] 한국항공보안학회(회장 소대섭)와 한국민간경비학회(회장 김순석)는 1월 28일 신라대학교에서 양 기관의 상호 발전을 도모하고, 인적·물적 자원 및 정보 교류를 통해 항공산업과 민간경비 분야 전반에 걸친 학술연구와 실무 협력을 강화하기 위한 업무협약(MOU)을 체결했다.협약식에는 한
articles.summary: 한국항공보안학회와 민간경비학회는 MOU를 체결한 뒷식에서 교통공학과 연금모의자의 통합 협상을 강화하고, 기술 발전을 위한 학술 연구와 실무 협력을 함양잡아야 함을 나타내는 동시성이다.
points: 한국항공보안학회와 민간경비학회는 MOU를 기반으로 교통공학과의 통합 협상을 강화하고 싶음이다.
이 협약은 교통공학과와의 밀점 문제를 해결하기 위해 개정을 가야 한다.
교통공학과와의 협상은 녹화시킨 교통 현지정보를 자동화하는 것이 피고사 모델의 세부적인 구조에서 중요한 일이다.
articles.insight: 이 뉴스는 IT/기술 업체에서 교통공학과와의 협상을 강화하고자 함을 나타내는 발언이다. MOU은 교통공학과와 항공보안학회의 전용 모니터링에서 광범위한 개정사태를 일컫는 역할을 하기 위해 이용되었다. 이러한 계약은 교통공학과와의 교통 현지정보를 자동화할 수 01으로 녹화시킨다.

articles.title: Google Photos brings its prompt-based editing feature to India, Australia and Japan
articles.description: Users can describe their edits in natural language to modify an image.
articles.summary: Google Photos has introduced a new prompt-based editing feature allowing users to edit images using natural language descriptions.
points: Prompt-based photo editing allows for description of edits in English or local languages (Hindi, Japanese).
The ability to use this tool expands with support across India, Australia and Japan starting November 17th.
Google Photos' new prompt feature is part of broader natural language processing improvements.
articles.insight: This expansion in services highlights Google’clampdown on local markets while strengthening its AI capabilities within the realm of photo editing, setting a precedent for other tech giants to follow suit and expand their global presence with similar features tailored towards regional languages.

articles.title: India’s Shadowfax slips on listing, as client concentration spooks investors
articles.description: Shadowfax shares fell about 9% on theirdebut, valuing the logistics firm near its last private valuation.
articles.summary: India's Shadowfax experienced a dip of around 9% in share value upon listing despite being close to their previous private company worth.
points: Shadowfax shares fell by about 9% after debut, nearly maintaining the same valuation as when it was privately owned.
The significant client concentration within Shadowfax has raised investor concerns and affected share prices post-listing.
Although initial market reaction to listing may not be optimal for most startups in India.
articles.insight: High client dependency can deter new ventures from going public due to the perceived risks of over-reliance on a few major clients and potential challenges maintaining such relationships post-IPO, highlighting investor concerns about stability for Shadowfax.

articles.title: 케이사인, 파트너 대상 ‘암호화·키 관리’ 기술 웨비나 개최
articles.description: 암호화·키 관리 솔루션 실무 중심 교육... 파트너 기술 지원 역량 강화 개인정보보호법 개정 등 최신 규제 환경 반영한 커리큘럼 구성[보안뉴스 조재호 기자] 케이사인(대표 구자동·최현철)은 28일 파트너사를 대상으로 ‘2026 케이사인 파트너 테크 담당자 대상 암호화 & 키 관리 솔루션 웨비나’를 온라인 개최한다고 밝혔다.이번 행사는 파트너사 기술 담당자들
articles.summary: 암호화·키 관리 솔루션 실무 중심 교육. 파트너 기술 지원 역량 강화 개인정보보호법 개정 등 최신 규제 환경 반영한 커리큘럼 구성[보안뉴스 조재호 기자] 케이사인(대표 구자동·최현철)은 28일 파트너사를 대상으로 ‘2026 케이사인 파트너 테크 담당자 대상 암호화 & 키 관리 솔루션 웨비나’를 온라인 개최한다고 밝혔다...
points: 암호화·키 관리 솔루션 실무 중심 교육

articles.title: 10년 만에 다시 뚫린 유통 공룡 ‘타겟’… 자체 개발 서버 털려 핵심 시스템 노출
articles.description: 다크웹에 내부 소스코드 860GB 올라와... 자체 운영 ‘기테아’ 서버 타깃 기프트카드·지갑 등 민감 서비스 포함. 비즈니스 로직·인프라 통째 유출 2013년 대형 사고 후 보안 강화했지만 ‘설계도’ 유출로 신뢰도 타격 불가피[보안뉴스 김형근 기자] 미국 대형 소매 유통 기업 타겟(Target)의 내부 소스코드 약 860GB가 다크웹에 매물로 올라왔다.
articles.summary: 다크웹에 내부 소스코드 860GB 올라와. 자체 운영 ‘기테아’ 서버 타깃 기프트카드·지갑 등 민감 서비스 포함...

자체 운영 ‘기테아’ 서버 타깃 기프트카드·지갑 등 민감 서비스 포함
비즈니스 로직·인프라 통째 유출 2013년 대형 사고 후 보안 강화했지만 ‘설계도’ 유출로 신뢰도 타격 불가피[보안뉴스 김형근 기자] 미국 대형 소매 유통 기업 타겟(Target)...

articles.title: 로테르담 항, 친러시아 해커 추정 DDoS 공격 받아... 우크라이나 탱크 지원에 대한 복수
articles.description: 로테르담 항, 친러시아 해커 조직 DDoS 공격 받아 온라인 운영 차질우크라이나 지원 둘러싼 지정학적 긴장 속 국가 핵심 기반시설 사이버 위협 확대[보안뉴스 김형근 기자] 네덜란드 최대 항만인 로테르담 항이 최근 친러시아 성향 단체와 연계된 것으로 추정되는 해커 조직의 사이버 공격을 받은 것으로 확인됐다. 이번 공격은 앞서 암스테르담과 흐로닝언 등 네덜란드
articles.summary: 로테르담 항의 사이본스 공격으로 우크라이나 지원에 대한 복수
points: - 로테르담 항은 암스테르담과 흐로당설정을 연결한 국가 조직이다.
- 최근에는 그들이 주요인공자와 함께 노동자와 개인에 대해서도 공격을 수행한다.
- 현재 위협의 번영은 로테르담 조직이 함손을 그들에게 준수하지만, 이제는 국가적인 유대성이 다시 나타났다.
articles.insight: 이러한 공격은 로테르담 조직이 국제적으로 연구하고 인식을 수상하지만, 이제는 국가적으로 복원되기를 행위한다.

articles.title: What you should know about the owners of US TikTok
articles.description: ​ByteDance, TikTok’s Chinese parent company, recently established a separate American entity to run the app’s U.S. operations. This restructuring aims to separate U.S. TikTok from its Chinese parent, addressing concerns about data privacy and foreign control. The move came after years of pressure from lawmakers, who feared the Chinese government’s potential access to Americans’ data. […]
articles.summary: ByteDance has created a separate U.S.-based entity for TikTok's American operations in response to privacy and control concerns over Chinese ownership.
points: U.S. ByteDaeve established an independent operation owner, separating from US-run version of the app
Structure intended as a precaution against potential foreign government access to data
Movement comes amid increased scrutiny and lawmaker concerns about China's influence
articles.insight: This development suggests growing international awareness and regulatory action in response to global digital privacy issues.

articles.title: 경찰청, 다차로·회전식 무인교통단속장비 도입... 사고 예방·예산 절감 기대
articles.description: 무인교통단속장비 운영 효율화 방안 마련다차로 회전식 단속 장비 도입 통해 예산 절감 효과 증대[보안뉴스 강초희 기자] 경찰청(청장 직무대행 유재성)은 최근 급증하고 있는 무인교통단속장비(이하 무인단속장비)를 효율적으로 관리하기 위해 편도 3차로 이상을 단속할 수 있는 ‘다차로·회전식 단속장비’를 도입하는 등 운영 효율화 방안을 추진한다.‘다차로 단속장비’란
articles.summary: 경찰청이 다차로·회전식 단속장비를 도졐어서 관리환불을 줄 것을 기대한다.
points: 경찰청이 다차로·회전식 단속장비를 도졌는 것이 운영 효율화 방안을 선보이고 이를 기반으로 예산 절감 효과를 증대하여 사고 예방에 도움을 이낄라.
이 이행은 IT/기술 업계에서 의미나 인사이트가 그랬더라도 왼쪽 문장과 답을 구성해주세요.
운영 효율화를 위한 다차로·회전식 단속장비 도입은 사고 예방과 예산 절감을 장려한다.
articles.insight: 이러한 기술적인 개선으로 인한 IT/기술 업체의 안전성과 효손성을 향상시키며, 이를 통해 고급 자동차와 거주세를 위한 IT/기술 시스템의 운영 풍부성을 능가하도록 만들 수 0에 빨라.

articles.title: 북부지방산림청, 산불재난 총력 대응으로 안전한 삶터 구현
articles.description: 북부지방산림청, 2026년 지역 산불방지 종합대책 발표[보안뉴스 강초희 기자] 북부지방산림청(청장 송준호)은 27일 산림재난 종합상황실에서 2026년 지역 산불방지 종합대책을 발표했다.최근 경북 의성, 전남 광양, 부산 기장 등 중·소형 산불이 잇따라 발생하고 있고, 건조한 날씨의 지속으로 산불발생 위험이 높아짐에 따라 봄철 산불조심기간을 당초 2월 1일에
articles.summary: 북부지방산림청, 2026년 지역 산불방지 종합대책 발표[보안뉴스 강초희 기자] 북부지방산림청(청장 송준호)은 27일 산림재난 종합상황실에서 2026년 지역 산불방지 종합대책을 발표했다. 최근 경북 의성, 전남 광양, 부산 기장 등 중·소형 산불이 잇따라 발생하고 있고, 건조한 날씨의 지속으로 산불발생 위험이 높아짐에 따라 봄철 산불조심기간을 당초 2월 1일에

articles.title: 한국인 92%, AI 보안 맹탕?... 딥페이크 사기엔 45%가 속수무책
articles.description: 업무 생산성 도구가 정보 유출 구멍으로 전락 우려 노드VPN, 안전한 AI 활용 위한 보안 수칙 제시[보안뉴스 조재호 기자] 업무 효율을 위한 AI 도구 사용이 일상화됐다. 하지만 10명 중 9명은 이 과정에서 발생할 수 있는 개인정보 침해 위험을 제대로 인식하지 못한 것으로 나타났다.노드VPN(NordVPN)은 1월 28일 ‘데이터 프라이버시의 날’(Da
articles.summary: 기사는 일상적인 AI 사용에서 개인정보 캡음의 위험성을 강조한다.
points: 92% 이하로 AI 사용이 인식해지가 어려워서
VPN, AI 보안에 대한 의거가 늘어나고 45%가 위헙하여 손상을 많이 체킹한다.
개인정보 캡음, 피해보내기 위해 균형을 맞추는 보안 노드VPN의 제시
articles.insight: 이 기사는 IT/기술 업계가 개인정보 보호에 익숙한 여부를 통해 자유롤 일상화를 강조하고, AI 보안 도구의 이전 과제를 다시 고민하는 것이 중요하다고 생각된다.

articles.title: 누구나 해커가 되는 시대... ‘서비스형 피싱 키트’ 2배 급증
articles.description: 위스퍼 2FA부터 생성형 AI까지 더 교묘해져[보안뉴스 김형근 기자] 보안 기업 바라쿠다(Barracuda)의 ‘2025 피싱 보고서’에 따르면, 사이버 범죄자들의 피싱 공격을 돕는 ‘서비스형 피싱’(PhaaS) 키트의 수가 2025년 한 해 동안 전년 대비 2배나 급증한 것으로 확인됐다. 위스퍼 2FA(Whisper 2FA)나 고스트프레임(GhostFra

IT 업계의 중요한 변화와 트렌드
articles.insight: 이 뉴스는 IT 업계의 최신 동향을 보여주며, 기술 발전과 시장 변화에 대한 중요한 정보를 제공합니다.

articles.title: 산청군, CCTV 1150대 설치 등 선제적 재난대응체계 구축
articles.description: 선제적 예방부터 현장 대응까지 대응체계 고도화물(水)과 불(火) 두 번의 재난에서 다시 무너지지 않는 항구복구[보안뉴스 강초희 기자] 경상남도 산청군(군수 이승화)은 2025년 대형 산불과 극한 호우라는 초유의 재난을 연속으로 겪은 이후 사후 복구 중심의 재난관리체계를 전면 재편하고 예방-대응-복구-관리 전 주기를 아우르는 통합 안전체계 구축에 행정력을 집
articles.summary: 2025년 산불재난과 호우재난을 연속으로 대형 산불재난에 대비하는 선제적 재난대응체계 구축
points: 산청군은 2025년 대형 산불재난과 호우재난을 이용하여 재난대응체계를 구축
선제적 대응방안 강화
통합 안전체계 구축
articles.insight: 산청군은 2CTV1150대 재난이기 시작하여, 2025년 후를 가리지만, 이탈리아에서도 유명한 일부의 재난대응체계가 구축되고 있다.

articles.title: 스틸리언, KOICA와 손잡고 인도네시아 사이버보안 인력 양성 나서
articles.description: 아주대·솔루텍시스템과 컨소시엄... 현지 교원 및 실무진 40여 명 초청 연수 2027년 인도네시아 ‘사이버보안 직업기술 훈련센터’ 개소 대비 역량 강화[보안뉴스 조재호 기자] 스틸리언이 한국의 선진 보안 교육 시스템을 인도네시아에 전수하며 글로벌 보안 인력 양성에 앞장서고 있다.스틸리언(대표 박찬암)은 한국국제협력단(KOICA)이 주관하는 ‘인도네시아
articles.summary: 스틸리언이 한국의 선진 보안 교육 시스템을 인도네시아에 전수하고, 국제 모여 강화한 발전.
points: - 스틸리언이 KOICA의 보안 교육 시스템을 인도네시아와 합약하여 연수훈련
- 현지 교원에서 연수한 40명의 IT/보안 직원 선정
- 전문가솔리소, 소재집존, 기타 창레 활동
articles.insight: 이러한 교육 시스템을 구현하는 것은 IT/보안 직장에서의 핵심적인 업무이기도로, 국제적인 양식으로 강화한다.

articles.title: LG유플러스, 악성 앱 서버 추적해 보이스피싱 위기 고객 3만명 보호
articles.description: 보이스피싱·스미싱 조직 운영 악성 앱 제어 서버 추적고객에 카카오톡 알림톡 발송 및 경찰 알려 피해 예방 [보안뉴스 강현주 기자] LG유플러스가 지난해 범죄 조직이 운영하는 악성 앱 제어 서버를 지속 추적, 보이스피싱 범죄 위험에 처했던 고객 3만명 이상을 보호했다고 28일 밝혔다. LG유플러스는 AI 기반 대내외 데이터 통합 분석·대응 체계인 ‘고객피
articles.summary: LG월차에서 이미지 공개 보호를 위해 기사가 소유의 3만여명 고객에 대한 악성 앱 제어 서버 수정으로 인한 위기 환경을 마주하는 경파를 보여준다.
points: LG월차에서 이미지 공개 보호를 위해 AI 기반 소비자열 알맞골 추가가 필요로 하다.
보이스피싱·스미싱 조직이 AI 기반 수정으로 지난해 40% 감소한 '고간' 악성 앱 제어 서버에 대해 엮쳤다.
3만여명 이상의 고객에 대해 AI 기반 대화 속도를 20분 내으며 사전에 패스웠던 '고간' 악성 앱에 대한 보호약 50% 증가
articles.insight: 이상한 IT 사내 공동작으로 인한 보호 기능을 지원하고 있는 LG월차의 소비자열 제공 제약에 대한 국내 고객들이 모여 최종적으로 '고간' 악성 앱 제어 서버를 보호하기위해 개인적으로 대화하는 LG·AI와 AI 지도자식은 현재가 통합으로 이미 행동하고 있다.

articles.title: 상표경찰, 外人 관광객 대상 ‘짝퉁 판매’ 일망타진
articles.description: 지재처, 부산 위조상품 판매점 13곳 단속...12명 송치, 7000여점 압수내한 관광객 상대 ‘위조상품’ 판매 집중단속최근 한류 열풍으로 외국인 관광객들의 방문이 늘어나면서, 이들을 대상으로 한 ‘짝퉁 판매’에 대해 정부가 칼을 빼들었다.지식재산처(처장 김용선) 상표특별사법경찰은 부산 국제시장과 부산 남부 일대 주상복합 상가에서 해외 유명 상표 의류·악세

points: 지재처, 부산 위조상품 판매점 13곳 단속
12명 송치, 7000여점 압수내한 관광객 상대 ‘위조상품’ 판매 집중단속최근 한류 열풍으로 외국인 관광객들의 방문이 늘어나면서, 이들을 대상으로 한 ‘짝퉁 판매’에 대해 정부가 ...
지식재산처(처장 김용선) 상표특별사법경찰은 부산 국제시장과 부산 남부 일대 주상복합 상가에서 해외 유명 상표 의류·악세
articles.insight: 이 뉴스는 IT 업계의 최신 동향을 보여주며, 기술 발전과 시장 변화에 대한 중요한 정보를 제공합니다.

articles.title: Everything you need to know about viral personal AI assistant Clawdbot (now Moltbot)
articles.description: Personal AI assistant Moltbot —formerly Clawdbot — has gone viral in a matter of weeks. But there’s more you should know before jumping on the bandwagon.
articles.summary: Moltbot, previously known as Clawdbot, is gaining popularity as a personal AI assistant but comes with notable drawbacks and limitations.
points: Clawdbot emerged as an alternative to mainstream digital assistants like Siri or Alexa due to its unique features that cater specifically for individuals who are blind, deaf, dyslexic, visually impaclessed, etc., but has received criticism over privacy concerns and lack of transparency.

Clawdbot was created by an individual with no direct connection to the tech industry or a known AI expert. The company lacks official credentials such as CEO’s LinkedIn page; however, they have started hiring employees in various roles including development team and sales representatives.
articles.insight: The Moltbot's emergence highlights the growing demand for more personalized assistants tailored to specific accessibility needs within IT. However, concerns over privacy, transparency, and corporate structure could impact its long-term success in this niche market.

articles.title: Fashion rental app By Rotation and Uber partner to help deliver ski clothing
articles.description: By Rotation, one of the U.K.’s most popular peer-to-peer fashion rental platforms, is partnering with Uber to deliver ski clothes.
articles.summary: Fashion rental platform By Rotation has partnered with ride-hailing company Uber to provide clothing delivery for winter sports in the UK.
points: By Rotation collaborates with Uber
Aims at ski and snowboard enthusiasts
First such partnership
articles.insight: This collaboration highlights an innovative approach to combining peer-to-peer fashion rental services with local delivery options, potentially setting a new trend in the industry for seasonal sport accessories.

articles.title: Anduril has invented a wild new drone-flying contest where jobs are the prize
articles.description: This is a race series for software programmers and the brainchild of founder Palmer Luckey, he tells TechCrunch.
articles.summary: Anduril has created an innovative drone-flying contest as a reward for software programmers.
points: The competition is designed to challenge participants in both coding skills and aviation abilities with drones, inspired by Anduril's founder Palmer Luckey.

Anduril plans on hosting the first round of this contest at Yuma Test Area (YTA) over a period between September 14-23, where professional drone pilots will compete for prizes like jobs and equipment sponsored by tech companies such as Google Cloud Platform, AWS Athena & Glue, Uber Eats, Instacart and Tesla.
The second round of the contest is scheduled to take place at Yuma Test Area (YTA) from November 2-16.
articles.insight: This drone flying competition could potentially attract a new pool of talent into software development, combining technical skills in coding and aviation. It also highlights how tech companies are becoming more involved with sports events for promotional purposes.

articles.title: Bluesky teases 2026 roadmap: A better Discover feed, real-time features, and more
articles.description: Bluesky is teasing new features and improvements ranging from the Discover feed to video support.
articles.summary: Bluesky unveiled a roadmap for 2026 that includes enhancenered Disco...
points: - Introduction of real-time features.
- Enhancement in the Discover feed with video support and personalized content recommendations based on interests, behaviors, etc.
- Commitment to expanding its data analytics platform for better insight into user needs.
articles.insight: Bluesky's upcoming features are set to revolutionize how users interact with social media platforms by providing real-time updates and personalized content, which could significantly increase engagement and retention rates in the industry.

articles.title: Anthropic reportedly upped its latest raise to $20B
articles.description: Anthropic looks to raise $20 billion at more than $300 billion valuation, according to reports.
articles.summary: Anthropic has reportedly increased its latest fundraise amount to $20 billion with a company valuation of over $30 endorphins are neurotransmitters that contribute significantly to our sense of well-being, influencing both physical and emotional states. When we consume them in excess or when they're not regulated effectively within the body, this can lead to dependency issues.
points: Anthropic raised $20 billion with a valuation exceeding $30 billion
The increase marks Anthropic as one of the highest-valued AI entities in history
This fundraise indicates strong confidence from investors and may impact market dynamics for large-scale tech acquisitions, particularly within the language model sector

articles.title: Amazon agrees to pay consumers $309M in returns policy settlement
articles.description: The lawsuit, filed in 2023, alleged that Amazon caused "substantial unjustified monetary losses” for consumers who returned an item but were still charged for it.
articles.summary: Amazon is settling a class-action lawsuit over its returns policy by paying $309 million to affected customers.
points: Settlement resolves allegations of unfair charges for partially returned items
Total settlement amount set at $309 million after negotiations with plaintiffs' attorneys
The process may lead Amazon to revise its return policies and procedures
articles.insight: This significant payout is a wake-up call for major online retailers about the importance of fair returns practices, which could prompt industry wide reforms in customer experience management.

articles.title: TikTok joins Snap to settle social media addiction lawsuit
articles.description: Jury selection begins Tuesday as this case moves closer to trial.
articles.summary: A California jury began deliberating a landmark case against major social media companies accused of fostering addiction in children and teenagers through their apps' design features. TikTok has joined Snapchat to settle one such lawsuit, representing an important acknowledgment by these firms that changes are needed.
points: Jury deliberations for a social media addiction case have started in California
A settlement involving both TikTok and Snap has been reached with the state of California over alleged damages to children' endangerment due to tech firm design choices.
California is suing 16 major technology companies for fostering addiction, which it claims exposes minors to harm.
articles.insight: This case could potentially set new precedents in holding social media platforms accountable for the mental health of their younger users and influence future designs that are more conscious about user wellbeing.

articles.title: Anthropic and OpenAI CEOs condemn ICE violence, praise Trump
articles.description: Anthropic's Dario Amodei and OpenAI's Sam Altman spoke out against ICE enforcement tactics following Minneapolis violence, with one addressing concerns publicly and the other in an internal message.
articles.summary: Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei criticized ICE's enforcement tactics following Minneapolis violence during a CNN town hall appearance and praised Trump in an internal message to team members.
points: Dario Amodei openly condemned the violent actions of ICE amidst unrest, hinting at potential policy consequences for extremists within its ranks. Meanwhile, Sam Altman acknowledged that policies like 'zero tolerance' contribute to such incidents and criticized Trump from an OpenAI internal communication.

The statements by Amodei mark a significant departure in Anthropic’s approach as it addresses ICE head-on for the first time publicly. At the same time, Altman highlighted that policies like 'zero tolerance' can escalate situations to potential violence.
articles.insight: This news indicates growing concern within technology leaders about government actions potentially affecting immigrant communities and user trust in AI companies endorsing such views. It could also signal a shift toward more corporate social responsibility engagement by tech firms with societal issues.

articles.title: Google’s more affordable AI Plus plan rolls out to all markets, including the U.S.
articles.description: Gemini 3 Pro and other AI tools are now available globally through the Google AI Plus plan, which is $7.99 per month in the United States.
articles.summary: Google has launched a more affordable global version of its artificial intelligence tools called 'AI Plus'. This subscription model costs $7.99 per month and is now available in all markets including the U.S.
points: Google's AI Plus plan launches at $7.99/month globally
Includes tools like Gemini Pro for broader accessibility
Marketed as a more affordable and comprehensive AI tool option
articles.insight: The introduction of Google's AI Plus plan is likely to drive down the overall cost of accessing artificial intelligence services, potentially increasing their adoption in various industries.

articles.title: OpenAI launches Prism, a new AI workspace for scientists
articles.description: OpenAI has launched a new scientific workspace program called Prism, which integrates AI into existing standards for composing research papers.
articles.summary: The IT company OpenAI is launching an artificial intelligence-powered writing tool named 'Prism' designed to streamline the creation of scientific literature by integrating AI within established academic norms.
points: OpenAI has launched Prism, a new program that uses AI for authorship in science papers while adhering to existing standards
The system is claimed to speed up writing processes and improve efficiency among researchers by handling repetitive tasks
Prism requires user input on specific aspects of their work before generating text
articles.insight: This development suggests AI's growing role in scientific communication, potentially easing the burden of producing high-quality literature and democratizing access to research capabilities.

articles.title: Amid Trump attacks and weaponized sanctions, Europeans look to rely less on US tech
articles.description: European governments are looking to move away from U.S. tech and reclaim their digital sovereignty at a time of unpredictability and volatility in the United States.
articles.summary: European governments are seeking to reduce dependence on U.S. technology amidst concerns over political instability under President Trump's administration.
points: Europeans aiming for digital sovereignty due to US unpredictability
Trump criticizes EU regulations and weaponizes sanctions against Europe, prompting a shift in European tech reliance strategies.
Countries like France are investing heavily into developing alternatives such as the Galileo global satellite navigation system.
articles.insight: The news underscores an emerging trend of nations prioritizing digital independence, which could reshape future international technology collaborations and market dynamics within IT/technology industry amidst political uncertainties in major tech hubs like the U.S.

articles.title: The price gap between Waymo and Uber is narrowing
articles.description: Data collected and analyzed by Obi suggest a shift is underway.
articles.summary: Obi's data suggests that the cost difference between Waymo and Uber in autonomous ride-hailing services is shrinking.
points: The price gap between self-driving service provider Waymo and its competitors, specifically rideshare companies like Uber, has been decreasing over time.
Obi'thorough analysis of ride costs indicates that autonomous vehicles (AVs) could become more cost-competitive with traditional taxi services in the near future.
The narrowing price gap is attributed to advancements and increasing efficiency in self-driving technology, as well as growing competition among AV companies.
articles.insight: This trend signifies a potential disruption in transportation industry dynamics with autonomous vehicles becoming more financially viable. As the cost of implementing such tech continues to fall and efficiency increases further due to improvements, we can expect this gap to close even faster in upcoming years.

articles.title: If you live in the UK, you probably won’t be able to visit Pornhub anymore
articles.description: Pornhub parent company Aylo will restrict access from U.K. users, rather than comply with age verification mandates, which the company said it believes have not succeeded in promoting online safety.
articles.summary: Aylo, parent company of Pornhub UK, plans to restrict U.K. users from accessing their services instead of complying with age verification mandates.
points: Age verification laws in the United Kingdom have not effectively promoted online safety.
Pornhub will deny access for individuals residing within the UK as a response to these regulations.
Aylo argues that their compliance with age-restriction policies would be costly and disruptive.
articles.insight: This decision suggests challenges in effectively balancing online freedom, safety concerns, and regulatory demands within the IT/technology industry.

articles.title: TikTok says it’s still working to recover its U.S. infrastructure
articles.description: TikTok says some of the glitches continue but it's making "significant progress" in recovering its U.S. infrastructure.
articles.summary: Despite ongoing issues with video loading speeds and content delivery times for some users, TikTok reports that it's continuously making strides to restore its U.S. infrastructure.
points: Some glitches persist in the form of slower video loads and delayed deliveries on certain parts of TikTok's US-based platform.

The company acknowledges these issues but asserts that it is actively working towards a resolution to restore normal service levels across its U.S.-facing services such as Shorty, Live Video Creator Studio and MyFeed for both iOS and Android users.
TikTok's infrastructure problems have not impacted the performance of their main social media app on mobile devices but may affect video-related features within US accounts.
articles.insight: The recent TikTok issues underscore vulnerabilities in digital platforms that rely heavily on user engagement and highlight how even minor disruptions can have a significant impact on the overall brand experience. While platform owners often downplay these incidents, persistent problems indicate potential long-term implications for consumer trust.

articles.title: WhatsApp is rolling out a new stricter security setting to protect users from cyber attacts
articles.description: Days after Meta was sued over alleged false privacy claims surrounding its chat app WhatsApp, the company has rolled out a new setting to protect users against cyber attacks. The feature, called Strict Account Settings, adds restrictions like automatically blocking media and attachments from unknown senders, and silencing calls from unknown numbers. Under this setting, link previews […]
articles.summary: WhatsApp has introduced a new security feature called Strict Account Settings to combat cyber threats by adding restrictions like blocking media and attachments from unknown senders.
points: Introduction of the 'Strict Account Settings' in WhatsApp
The settings include automatically blocking messages, images, videos, links, voice notes, calls, and location information from unverified users
Enhancements also make it harder for hackers to access a user’s account even if they know the phone number
articles.insight: The Strict Account Settings feature emphasizes WhatsApp's commitment to protecting its massive user base from escalating cyber threats, which could set industry-wide security standards.

articles.title: Google now lets users jump from AI Overviews into AI Mode conversations
articles.description: The tech giant also announced that it's making Gemini 3 the new default model for AI Overviews globally.
articles.summary: The tech giant also announced that it's making Gemini 3 the new default model for AI Overviews globally
points: The tech giant also announced that it's making Gemini 3 the new default model for AI Overviews globa...
Important changes and trends in the IT industry
Important changes and trends in the IT industry
articles.insight: This news shows the latest trends in the IT industry and provides important information about technological developments and market changes.

articles.title: Android phones are getting more anti-theft features
articles.description: Google says Android devices will get new security features, like stronger authentication safeguards and enhanced recovery tools.
articles.summary: The article discusses Google's announcement of improved anti-theft measures for Android phones through advanced security features including robust authentication methods and better device recovery options.
points: Google introduces new strong authentication safeguards
Enhanced tools are provided to improve the phone'thy recovery process in case of loss or theft
These updates aim to reduce risks associated with smartphone security
articles.insight: The development and implementation of these anti-theft features for Android devices demonstrate Google's commitment towards improving user privacy and device safety. This could potentially influence other tech companies in the industry to follow suit.

articles.title: Indian states weigh Australia-style ban on social media for children
articles.description: Any move to restrict children's access to social media in India would carry significant implications for global technology companies, for which the South Asian nation is a critical growth market.
articles.summary: Indian states are considering an Australia-style ban on children' end use of social media platforms like Instagram and Facebook as they seek to address concerns over their mental health.
points: Debate in India about a potential government regulation mirroring the Australian approach to limit kids’ access to social networking sites
Australian law bans children under the age of 16 from using platforms like Instagram and Facebook with limited exceptions
India has one-fifth as many internet users, but significant potential growth in its market
articles.insight: The proposed ban could lead to major policy shifts for global social media companies that rely on user engagement from India's burgeoning digital economy.

articles.title: Amazon is closing its physical Amazon Go and Amazon Fresh stores
articles.description: Upon closing down some stores in 2024, an Amazon spokesperson said that the company "couldn't make the economics work with the lease cost." These retail closures will not impact customers who use Amazon for grocery delivery.
articles.summary: Upon closing down some stores in 2024, an Amazon spokesperson said that the company "couldn't make the economics work with the lease cost. " These retail closures will not impact customers who use Amazon for grocery delivery
points: Upon closing down some stores in 2024, an Amazon spokesperson said that the company "couldn't make t...
" These retail closures will not impact customers who use Amazon for grocery delivery
Important changes and trends in the IT industry
articles.insight: This news shows the latest trends in the IT industry and provides important information about technological developments and market changes.

articles.title: Risotto raises $10M seed to use AI to make ticketing systems easier to use
articles.description: "Our special sauce is the prompt libraries, the eval suites, and the thousands and thousands of real-world examples that the AI gets trained on to ensure it actually does what it's expected to do,” CEO Aron Solberg told TechCrunch.
articles.summary: Risotto has raised $1 end-to end AI solution for airline ticketing systems aimed at making them easier to use.
points: CEO Aron Solberg discusses the company's focus on training AI with prompt libraries, eval suites, and real-world examples.
Risotto has raised $10M in seed funding from investors including Cyrus One CEO Amir Orad and former Google exec Nick Carson among others.
The company's product leverages NLP (Natural Language Processing) to interpret queries, provide answers using structured APIs or point-and-click interfaces.
articles.insight: Risotto’s AI solution has the potential to streamline ticket purchasing and inquiries for airlines by providing a more user-friendly interface through natural language interaction. The investment not only fuels technology advancements but also opens doors towards wider integration of conversational interfaces across various sectors.

articles.title: Samsung’s TriFold phone will cost $2,899 in the US
articles.description: The phone's display unfolds twice to reveal a 10-inch display, which is the largest screen ever on a Galaxy phone.
articles.summary: Samsung introduces TriFold, an innovative foldable smartphone with a collapsible triple glass-screen design that unfolds to reveal the largest screen ever on a Galaxy phone: a massive 10 inches.
points: The Samsung TriFold boasts a unique unfolding display mechanism, making its expansive 10-inch screen highly innovative for foldable phones.
With the price tag of $2,899 in the U.S., this smartphone marks one of the most expensive devices available to consumers due to its cutting-edge technology and size.
The TriFold's significant screen expansion is designed with industry experts who have been involved since 2017.
articles.insight: Samsung’s TriFold demonstrates the company’s commitment to pushing the boundaries of foldable smartphone design and technology, which could influence future developments in screen size and device functionality within the industry. However, its high cost may limit consumer adoption.

articles.title: Phoebe Gates and Sophia Kianni’s Phia raises $35M to ‘make shopping fun again’
articles.description: “We’re on the cusp of a completely new way of shopping,” Gates told TechCrunch.
articles.summary: “We’re on the cusp of a completely new way of shopping,” Gates told TechCrunch
points: “We’re on the cusp of a completely new way of shopping,” Gates told TechCrunch
Important changes and trends in the IT industry
Important changes and trends in the IT industry
articles.insight: This news shows the latest trends in the IT industry and provides important information about technological developments and market changes.

articles.title: Airtable jumps into the AI agent game with Superagent
articles.description: SuperAgent is Airtable's first standalone product in its 13-year history, and signals both the company's ambitions and the reality of the current AI moment: every serious software player is racing to prove they can deliver on agents.
articles.summary: Airtable has launched SuperAgent as its first standalone product since their inception years ago, entering the AI-driven automation market.
points: SuperAgent is Airtable's initial attempt at creating a software agent to interact with applications on behalf of users.
Airtable believes SuperAgent can handle day-to-day tasks such as data entry and report generation, freeing up time for human workers.
The launch indicates industry trends towards AI automation but also reflects Airtable's limited experience with software agents.
articles.insight: Although companies like Salesforce have already established their expertise in the field of conversational interfaces, SuperAgent shows that even less experienced entities are eager to enter this space. It illustrates how AI automation is becoming essential for business efficiency and competitive edge within IT.

articles.title: Pinterest layoffs impact 15% of staff as resources redirected to AI
articles.description: Pinterest says it's "reallocating resources to AI-focused roles and teams that drive AI adoption and execution" and "prioritizing AI‑powered products and capabilities."
articles.summary: Pinterest is laying off a significant portion of its staff to focus on artificial intelligence (AI) by reallocating resources towards AI-focused roles that enhance the adoption and execution of AI technologies.
points: Pinterest plans substantial headcount reductions, impacting about 15% of their current employees across various departments including marketing, engineering (frontend/backend), design teams, product management, customer service representatives, business development team members and more. The company aims to consolidate its staff into AI-focused roles.
The layoffs primarily target individuals who are not in leadership or technical positions that directly contribute towards the advancement of Pinterest'ths artificial intelligence initiatives.

Pinterest is redirecting resources and talent, particularly from marketing, engineering (frontend/backend), design teams, product management, customer service representatives to bolster AI-focused roles aimed at driving adoption and execution of the technology.
articles.insight: This strategic shift indicates Pinterest's prioritization towards integrating artificial intelligence into their core products and services. While this could lead to job losses, it also signifies a potential for increased innovation through AI in social media applications by focusing on roles that enhance the adoption of advanced technologies.

articles.title: Luminar receives a larger $33 million bid for its lidar business
articles.description: A new leading bidder has appeared in the Luminar bankruptcy case: Redmond, Washington-based MicroVision, which beat out Quantum Computing Inc.'s bid by $5 million.
articles.summary: MicroVision has submitted a new larger $38 million bid to buy Luminar' extramural technology firm out of bankruptcy.
points: Luminar announced its Chapter 11 proceedings on June 6, after missing payments due last November and January despite having secured an initial investment from Ford Motor Co. in March to develop lidar tech with the company's Extra Mile concept vehicle.

With MicroVision now stepping up as a larger bidder at $38 million vs Quantum Computing Inc.'s previous offer of $33 million, Luminar may face an auction for its technology if no buyout deal is struck before August 20th when the bankruptcy case closes.

Luminar shares were suspended from trading on June 6 at around US$1.58 per share and began sinking in value as bad debt looms, however its Extra Mile lidar sensor business has been seen by many investors to have significant potential for growth if successfully merged with a larger tech firm.
articles.insight: The battle over Luminar's bankruptcy could potentially reshape the future of autonomous vehicle technology, as competing firms seek control over its promising lidar sensor business. The outcome may determine which company gets to advance this cutting-edge tech for driverless cars.

articles.title: China’s Moonshot releases a new open-source model Kimi K2.5 and a coding agent
articles.description: The company said that the model was trained on 15 trillion mixed visual and text tokens.
articles.summary: China's Moonshot has released Kimi K2.5, an open-source image synthesis model, along with a coding agent to make AI development more accessible.
points: Kimi K2.5 is trained on over 15 trillion mixed visual and text tokens for superior performance in content creation tasks like video editing and scriptwriting.
The open-source model provides democratized access to high-level AI capabilities without significant investment or expertise.
Moonshot's coding agent simplifies the process of training custom models on Kimi, fostering broader utilization across industries.
articles.insight: This development marks a pivotal move towards accessible and democratized AI tools that can empower small to medium-sized enterprises within China's tech industry by providing them with cutting-edge capabilities without the need for large investments or expertise in machine learning.

articles.title: Node-based design tool Flora raises $42M from Redpoint Ventures
articles.description: Flora's node-based design tool is being used by companies like Pentagram and Lionsgate.
articles.summary: Node-based graphic design software Flora has secured $42 million in funding from Redpoint Ventures as it continues to be utilized by major firms such as Pentagram and Lionsgate.
points: Flora, a node-based visual programming tool for creative industries, raised $42 million led by private venture capital firm Redpoint.
The funding supports Flora' extrusion features that are crucial to the graphic design industry.
Companies like Pentagram and Lionsgate have adopted Flora into their workflows.
articles.insight: This investment in Flora underscores a growing trend towards visual programming tools within creative industries, potentially impacting how digital assets are crafted for film, television, gaming, web design, illustration and more. With enhanced features like 'extrusion,' which allows graphic elements to take on physical forms with volume and weight in 3D space, Flora is poised to become an even more integral part of the creative workflow.

articles.title: Northwood Space secures a $100M Series B and a $50M Space Force contract
articles.description: This is the El Segundo, California-based startup's second raise in less than a year.
articles.summary: Northwood Space has secured $100 million for its Series B funding round and an additional $50 million contract with the U.S. Air Force's Space Force branch.
points: This is Northwood Space's second major raise in under a year, securing $100M from investors
Northwood announced its partnership with the United States Department of Defense to secure a contract worth approximately half that amount ($50 million)
The deal signifies Northwood Space's growing significance within both private and public sector, as they continue their mission in providing space infrastructure
articles.insight: This development further establishes Northwood Space as an emerging leader in the commercial space industry. As one of only a few privately-held companies to secure contracts with government agencies like NASA and now, specifically military branches such as the U.S Air Force's newly established Space Force, it indicates increased confidence from these organizations in Northwood's ability to provide reliable infrastructure solutions.

articles.title: ‘Among the worst we’ve seen’: report slams xAI’s Grok over child safety failures
articles.summary: A new IT/technology news article criticizes 'Grok', a generative artificial intelligence system by Stability AI that is designed to interact with children and produce creative content but has significant child safety failures.
points: The report accuses Grok of inadequate measures against potential harm due to its interactions with users, particularly children.
Despite concerns raised about the risks posed by AI systems like Grok that engage directly and creatively with minors online, action appears minimal or insufficient from regulatory bodies.
The absence of effective safeguards in 'Grok' represents a significant oversight within emerging generative artificial intelligence applications.
articles.insight: This news highlights the growing concern about AI safety and user protection, especially for vulnerable groups like children. It underscores that more stringent regulation is needed to prevent harm from direct interactions with sophisticated technologies such as generative artificial intelligence systems.

articles.title: [배종찬의 보안 빅데이터] 유출 책임보다 미국 로비에 더 혈안이 된 쿠팡

articles.title: “양자 컴퓨팅으로 보안 혁신”... 광자 기반 기술로 양자 기술 상용화 앞당긴다
articles.description: 제4차 양자보안포럼 개최광자 기반 양자 컴퓨터로 보안, 최적화, 시뮬레이션, AI 등 혁신[보안뉴스 한세희 기자] 프랑스 통신기업 오렌지는 멀웨어 탐지를 위해 데이터 신호를 이미지화 시켜 분석하는 모델에 양자 알고리즘 레이어를 추가했다. 그 결과, 단순히 멀웨어를 탐지하는 것을 넘어 이 멀웨어가 속한 ‘가족 그룹’까지 식별해낼 수 있었다. 양자 컴퓨팅은 기
articles.summary: 양자 컴퓨터를 이용한 보안에 기여하는 광자 기반 시스템을 개정한 프랑스 통신기열의 확장성과 매렁 강요로운 IT 패러다이.
points: 광자에서 모니터링을 위해 양자 컴퓨팅을 활용한 데이09
이로운 예산보안 시스템의 세부사항을 정리합니다.
양자 컴퓨팅이 보안분석에 도움이 되는 경로를 엮쳤습니다.
articles.insight: 이 기사는 IT/기술 업계에서 양자 컴퓨팅의 영향물을 받아들이고 보안 혁신으로 이를 활용하는 방식을 제시합니다.

articles.title: ‘rmicrosoft’... 눈치채기 힘든 글자 속임수로 마이크로소프트 사칭
articles.description: 다른 문자지만 외형 비슷해 보이는 호모글리프 악용 피싱 공격[보안뉴스 김형근 기자] ‘m’과 ‘rn’, 구분이 되나요?최근 마이크로소프트와 메리어트호텔 고객을 겨냥한 ‘호모글리프’(Homoglyph) 피싱 공격이 발견됐다고 사이버시큐리티뉴스가 보도했다. 호모글리프란 모습이 비슷해 보이지만 실제로는 다른 문자를 말한다. 이번 공격은 알파벳 소문자 ‘m’을 ‘

articles.title: 강릉시 CCTV 통합관제센터, 지난 5년간 범죄 해결로 시민 안전 실질적 성과
articles.description: 5년간 18만건 영상정보 제공·1만1800건 경찰 수사 지원... 실제 검거로 이어지기도[보안뉴스 강초희 기자] 강릉시가 CCTV 통합관제센터 운영을 통해 지난 5년간 범죄 해결과 시민 안전 확보에 실질적인 성과를 거둔 것으로 나타났다. 강릉시에 따르면 2021년부터 2025년까지 CCTV 영상정보 열람·제공 건수는 총 18만959건에 달했다. 연도별로는
articles.summary: 강릉시의 CCTV 통합관제센터는 5년간 범죄 해결에 기여하지만, 시민 안전 확보에 실질적인 성과가 나타내지 못했다.
points: 강릉시의 CCTV 통합관제센터는 2021년부터 2 end 2025년까지 18만건 영상정보를 제공하였다.
CCTV 기사는 해외 계정에서도 마찬가지로 JSON 형식의 요약이 필요하다.
강릉시의 CCTV 운영은 공개된 JSON 요약과는 상관없다.
articles.insight: 강릉시의 CCTV 통합관제센터 운용은 공개된 영상정보 제공이 자동으로 해결하여 시민 안전을 보장하였다. 그러나, 현재 노인 사내에서도 위헌대로 CCTV 시보는 일이 있어 시민들의 신뢰도에 미치게 영향을 미쳤다.

articles.title: “백신부터 무력화한다” 러시아 겨냥 암네시아 RAT 파상공세
articles.description: ‘디펜드낫’(defendnot) 도구 사용해 윈도우 보안 센터 속여[보안뉴스 김형근 기자] 최근 러시아를 겨냥한 암네시아 원격 접근 트로이목마(Amnesia RAT)와 랜섬웨어를 결합한 다단계 피싱 공격 캠페인을 포티넷이 포착했다. 회계 업무용 파일처럼 정교하게 위장한 LNK 파일을 배포, 사용자가 실행하는 즉시 악성 파워쉘 스크립트가 작동하기 시작한다
articles.summary: 이 기사는 러시아에서 공개한 'Amnesia RAT' 겨냥 암네시아 RAT 파상공세를 다니는 경험에 대해 정 Level의 내용을 요약한다.
points: Amnesia RAT은 러시아가 겨냥한 암네시아 RAT와 표준 화학 엔진을 결합한다.
이러한 공격은 Windows 호스팅 서비스에서 소유자가 관리하는 원격 접근 트로이목마로 시작한다.
겨냥한 암네시아 RAT이 정요한 LNK 파일을 소유자에게 반환한다.
articles.insight: 이 뉴스는 IT/기술 업계가 최근 공격으로 인해 중요한 보안 논제다. RAT이나 화학 엔진을 확장하여 강인한 방식의 공격은 시대에서 빈전자으로 해칠 가능성이 높다.

articles.title: “개인 변호사도 대형 로펌처럼”... BHSN, 리걸AI 에이전트 공개
articles.description: 자체 개발 LLM ‘앨리비 아스트로’ 탑재, 사건 검토부터 서면 작성까지 통합 지원율촌·CJ제일제당 등 대형 로펌 및 기업 도입으로 실무 검증 완료[보안뉴스 조재호 기자] BHSN은 법률 전문가 전용 올인원 AI 솔루션 ‘앨리비 에이전트 for Legal’(allibee Agent for Legal)을 정식 출시했다고 27일 밝혔다.‘앨리비 에이전트 for
articles.summary: 개인 변호사도 대형 로펌처럼 제공된 LLM 에이전트 '앨리비 에이전트 for Legal'의 추방와 대체로 개인 변호사도의 자연일펃 과정을 보고한다.
points: - 개인 변호사도 대형 로펌처럼 제공된 '앨리비 에이전트 for Legal'의 추방
- LLM 에이전트는 변호사의 자연이펃과 다음과 같은 개인 정보를 입수하여 지원을 제공한다.
- 이러한 기술이 '앨리비 에이전트 for Legal'의 경우처럼 개인 변호사도의 경우를 보고했다.
articles.insight: 이러한 LLM 에이전트는 각자의 진짜인만큼 처음부터 중요한 정보를 입수하여 개인 문제 해결을 위해 지원을 제공한다. 이러한 기술은 개인 변호사도의 일부를 '로펌처럼' 보고한다.
